sentence: Estee Lauder ( EL ) sells premium cosmetics including makeup, fragrances and hair / skin care products.
The company distributes its products through department stores (Macy's, Bloomingdale's), duty free shops at airports as well as prestige salons and spas.
Estee Lauder competes with players like Revlon ( REV ), Avon Products ( AVP ) and P&G ( PG ).
The company's brands include Aramis, Clinique, La Mer, Aveda and designer brands such as Donna Karan, Tommy Hilfiger, Michael Kors and Sean John.
We recently launched coverage of the company with a Trefis Price estimate of $53 for Estee lauder's stock , about 7% below the current market price of $57.
We've broken down our analysis of Estee Lauder into four major product segments as shown below.
